snippet: After some notable previous revelations proved true, Britain is now taking each new case seriously and engaging in a systemic review.
abstract: Revelations of child sexual abuse by prominent British politicians and entertainers have sparked profusion of similar accusations and prompted authorities to thoroughly examine all allegations; investigators are also looking into possible police corruption and complicity in pedophile rings as well as societal and governmental responsibility.
lead_paragraph: After some notable previous revelations proved true, Britain is now taking each new case seriously and engaging in a systemic review.

headline.main: In Britain, Edward Heath Case Intensifies Debate Over Validity of Sex Abuse Claims
headline.print_headline: Shock in Britain as More Abuse Claims Emerge
